title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.21 - Verification of numbers drawn
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.21 - Verification of numbers drawn

State Regulations

Any player shall be entitled to call for a verification
of all numbers drawn at the time a winner is determined, and for a verification
of the objects or balls remaining in the receptacle and not yet drawn. The
verification shall be made in the immediate presence of the member in charge of
the occasion and in the immediate presence of one or more disinterested
players. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
